data.name: The Letter - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This contains the full and remastered version of all the soundtracks used in The Letter - a horror visual novel game. Purchasing this DLC unlocks the 'Music Room' section in the game.

Each track has its own unique, complementary sketch. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.

Track list (34 total):

A. Main Theme (1):
  • The Letter (1:06)

B. Songs (6):
  • Letters Goodbye by Amanda Lee (4:44)
  • Letters Goodbye [Instrumental] (4:44)
  • Lone Heart Beats True by Elsie Lovelock (4:23)
  • Lone Heart Beats True [Instrumental] (4:23)
  • Fly by Jessee Reyna (3:39)
  • Fly [Instrumental] (3:39)

C. Character Themes (8):
  • Ashton's Theme - Afternoon Drive (2:56)
  • Ghost's Theme - Waltz of Fate (3:07)
  • Hannah's Theme - Forgotten Dreams (3:12)
  • Isabella's Theme - Tomorrow (4:05)
  • Luke's Theme - A Madman's Symphony (2:28)
  • Marianne's Theme - Mint and Toblers (2:31)
  • Rebecca's Theme - Field of Dasies (3:19)
  • Zachary's Theme - Last Sunset of Autumn (3:43)

D. Others (18):
  • Abide with Me (1:53)
  • Bloody Halls (3:48)
  • Don't Question the Silence (1:13)
  • Embers (1:42)
  • False Whispers (1:09)
  • Fleeting Memories (1:23)
  • Fragments of Yesterday (1:42)
  • Help Me (1:22)
  • Let Me Out (0:42)
  • Lost in the Park (2:29)
  • Midnight Walk (2:06)
  • Road to Twilight (0:50)
  • School Break (2:02)
  • Tête-à-tête [Piano & Cello] (2:24)
  • Tête-à-tête [String Quartet] (2:38)
  • Trapped Room (0:55)
  • Warm Embrace (3:23)
  • Wires and Shackles (1:29)

E. Special (1):
  • Pretty Fly for an Asian Guy (0:11)

data.short_description: This DLC contains the full and remastered version of all the soundtracks used in The Letter - a horror visual novel game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
